Class Collider

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobject.Component
      • physics.Collider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Collider
extends Component
    Collider component for physical calculation
    Author:
    jafi2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isBlocking

        public boolean isBlocking
        Can other objects pass through the collider
        if on one of the colliders has isBlocking == false the colliders can pass through each other.
        onCollision will still be called

      • isStatic

        public boolean isStatic
        can the collider be moved TODO replace this with endless mass after implementing force into physics

      • Collider

        public Collider(java.lang.Integer layer,
                java.lang.Boolean isBlocking,
                java.lang.Boolean isStatic,
                java.lang.Boolean sendCollision,
                java.lang.Boolean receiveCollision)
        Create a new Collider
        Parameters:
        layer - the physical layer of the collider
        isBlocking - can other colliders pass through this one?
        isStatic - can the collider be moved?
        sendCollision - can the collider send a collision event to others?
        receiveCollision - can the collider receive collision event from others?
